scripts.install:core: cd core && rm -rf node_modules/ yarn.lock && yarn && yarn build && yarn install:dep && cd ../
scripts.install:web: cd web && rm -rf node_modules/ yarn.lock && yarn && yarn install:dep && cd ../
scripts.install:mobile: cd mobile && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn && yarn install:dep && cd ../
scripts.install:all: yarn install:core && yarn install:web && yarn install:mobile && yarn install:api
scripts.install:dep:all: yarn build:core && cd web && yarn install:dep
scripts.update:core: cd core && yarn upgrade && yarn build && yarn install:dep
scripts.update:web: cd web && yarn upgrade && yarn install:dep
scripts.update:mobile: cd mobile && yarn upgrade && yarn install:dep
scripts.update:all: yarn update:core && yarn update:web && yarn update:mobile && cd api/ && composer update
scripts.outdated:all: cd web && yarn outdated && cd ../core && yarn outdated && cd ../mobile && yarn outdated
